hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Heart Container#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Green Rupee#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that ##the Market## has #6# major items.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that ##the Shadow Temple## has #8# major items.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that a #spider in the wasteland# holds #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Gerudo Card#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Gerudo Card#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that plundering #the Temple of Time# is a foolish choice.

HC (Malon).text: I'm Commander Shepard, and this is my favorite Gossip Stone in Hyrule!

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #a Blue Rupee#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# is on the way of the hero.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that Sheik dispelled the barrier around #Ganon's Tower#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that inside the #lakeside lab# a person and a spider hold...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Shadow Temple Small Key#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Blue Rupee#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is on the path to #Bongo Bongo#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that leaping above the Market entrance enriches most children.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #a Water Temple Small Key# can be found at #Zora's Fountain#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #Zora's Fountain# is on the path to #Morpha#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: Did you know that there's a 1/201 chance per Rupee that the Zora from the diving minigame tosses a 500 Rupee?^Keep winning and the odds go up!

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #a Game Key# can be found in #the Market#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# is on the way of the hero.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #Bombs (5 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Fire Temple MQ Megaton Hammer Chest

LW (Bridge).text: They say that plundering #Zora's River# is a foolish choice.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Heart Container#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that inside the #Royal Family Tomb#, you will find...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Recovery Heart#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #the Thieves' Hideout# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Hideout 2 Torch Jail In Cell Pot 2

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #the Stone of Agony#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Statue Room Northeast Chest

ToT (Left).text: They say that ##the Temple of Time## has #0# major items.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Green Rupee#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that at the #back of the Graveyard#, there is #the Gerudo Training Ground#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that a #pool of lava# in Goron City blocks the way to #ReDeads# guarding a chest.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Blue Rupee#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #collecting cuccos# rewards #the Minuet of Forest#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Domain# is a foolish choice.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #a Piece of Heart#.
hinted_locations: Fire Temple MQ Near Boss Chest
